info.title: IngestZip API
info.description: An API service that fetches and processes ZIP files, converting them to multipart/form-data streams with various filtering options.

get.summary: Fetch and process a ZIP file
get.description: Fetches a ZIP file from the provided URL, processes its contents, and returns a multipart/form-data stream with the filtered files.

parameters.name: zipUrl
parameters.description: URL-encoded path to the ZIP file to fetch and process

parameters.name: omitFirstSegment
parameters.description: Remove the first segment from file paths in the ZIP archive

parameters.name: omitBinary
parameters.description: Skip binary files in the output

parameters.name: enableFuzzyMatching
parameters.description: Enable fuzzy matching for path patterns

parameters.name: rawUrlPrefix
parameters.description: Prefix to use for raw URLs for binary files (if set, binary files are referenced by URL instead of including content)

parameters.name: basePath
parameters.description: Base path(s) to filter files by. Only files under these paths will be included

parameters.name: pathPatterns
parameters.description: Glob pattern(s) to include files matching these patterns. Supports picomatch syntax

parameters.name: excludePathPatterns
parameters.description: Glob pattern(s) to exclude files matching these patterns. Supports picomatch syntax

parameters.name: maxFileSize
parameters.description: Maximum file size in bytes to include

200.description: ZIP file successfully processed and streamed

500.description: Server error processing the ZIP file

x-source-authorization.description: Optional authorization header to forward to the ZIP source

content.description: File content (or omitted if using rawUrlPrefix for binary files)

x-file-hash.description: SHA-256 hash of the file content

x-url.description: URL to access the raw file (only present for binary files when rawUrlPrefix is provided)

tags.name: ZIP Processing
tags.description: Operations related to fetching and processing ZIP files
